archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0509
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to enter into a hardship agreement with Vodafone which includes deferral & special arrangement of payments, so that if I experience hardship Vodafone can help me

properties.value: Does it apply to both interest free devices and plans? Anywhere where customer can have debt to Vodafone.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
